articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/thehackernews
articles.title: Italian Data Protection Watchdog Accuses ChatGPT of Privacy Violations - The Hacker News
articles.description: Italy's data watchdog accuses ChatGPT of violating EU privacy laws by collecting sensitive data and exposing children to inappropriate content.
articles.content:
Italy's data protection authority (DPA) has notified ChatGPT-maker OpenAI of supposedly violating privacy laws in the region.
"The available evidence pointed to the existence of breaches of the prov… [+3887 chars]
